name: Darb Technology Holding Ltd
description: Developer of a digital facilities platform designed for providing home maintenance services. The company's platform offers a wide range of services for all home maintenance needs while keeping up with current trends and finding continuous areas of innovative approaches and improvements, enabling customers to access technicians in an on-demand model.
one_liner: Developer of a digital facilities platform designed for providing home maintenance services. The company's platform offers a wide range of services for all home maintenance needs while keeping up with current trends and finding continuous areas of innovative approaches and improvements, enabling customers to access technicians in an on-demand model.

name: Alterestate Inc.
description: An all-in-one platform that empowers real estate agencies and developers to boost sales and enhance efficiency through data-driven CRM, marketing, and automation tools.
one_liner: An all-in-one platform that empowers real estate agencies and developers to boost sales and enhance efficiency through data-driven CRM, marketing, and automation tools.

name: Dora LLC
description: Dora Pay: AI for screening the best tenants and collecting rent on time.
one_liner: Dora Pay: AI for screening the best tenants and collecting rent on time.

name: Ejari Property Technologies Holdings Limited
description: Operator of a real estate technology company intended to provide rent now and pay later service for residential properties. The company rents the unit on behalf of the customer for a period of one year or six months and then re-rents it to the customer with a monthly payment plan, enabling customers to reduce their financial burden and pay rent on a monthly basis.
one_liner: Operator of a real estate technology company intended to provide rent now and pay later service for residential properties. The company rents the unit on behalf of the customer for a period of one year or six months and then re-rents it to the customer with a monthly payment plan, enabling customers to reduce their financial burden and pay rent on a monthly basis.

name: Expansive Realty S.A.P.I. de C.V.
description: Developer of an online investment platform created to facilitate real estate crowdfunding. The company's platform displays real estate projects with descriptions, risk factors as well as performance to investors for funding, enabling small and medium-sized developers with the lack of opportunities to finance their projects.
one_liner: Developer of an online investment platform created to facilitate real estate crowdfunding. The company's platform displays real estate projects with descriptions, risk factors as well as performance to investors for funding, enabling small and medium-sized developers with the lack of opportunities to finance their projects.

name: Flat Holdings Limited
description: Operator of an online property listing platform intended to help people buy and sell residential properties. The company's platform offers a searchable database that helps to find, browse, and purchase domestic estates based on feedback and reviews from registered customers, enabling users to locate and list properties at a certain range of prices.
one_liner: Operator of an online property listing platform intended to help people buy and sell residential properties. The company's platform offers a searchable database that helps to find, browse, and purchase domestic estates based on feedback and reviews from registered customers, enabling users to locate and list properties at a certain range of prices.

name: HappyCo, Inc.
description: Developer of a property inspection platform designed to inspect, monitor, and analyze the performance of real estate assets. The company's platform allows for undertaking mobile inspections, work order management, and remote monitoring and is used for inspecting residential real estate, commercial buildings, cruise ships, ski resorts, food, and fire safety, enabling apartment operators to have real-time visibility and control of operations.
one_liner: Developer of a property inspection platform designed to inspect, monitor, and analyze the performance of real estate assets. The company's platform allows for undertaking mobile inspections, work order management, and remote monitoring and is used for inspecting residential real estate, commercial buildings, cruise ships, ski resorts, food, and fire safety, enabling apartment operators to have real-time visibility and control of operations.

name: Infraspeak, LDA
description: Developer of a facility management platform designed to bring entire operations together with intelligent maintenance. The company's platform automates recurring tasks, makes everything work together, and reduces bureaucracy, risks, and costs with the help of innovative technologies, APIs, applications, and sensors to transform all data into actionable insights and suggestions, enabling facilities owners, managers, and service providers to manage facilities significantly with less stress, paper, and costs.

name: LQN Technologies, Inc
description: Developer of a property search engine designed to choose housing credit options. The company's platform accompanies and advises the buyer and seller throughout their search and negotiation process and provides a list of property details and accompanies buyers in the process of acquiring credit and reducing the time from the request to its disbursement, enabling buyers and sellers to save time, and money and increase the effectiveness of closing businesses.

name: TRB Ventures Sdn. Bhd.
description: Developer of a real-estate fin-tech platform designed for property developers, agents and bankers. The company's platform brings together real estate developers, sales teams, bankers, lawyers and buyers, enabling clients to avoid long and arduous property sales journeys.
one_liner: Developer of a real-estate fin-tech platform designed for property developers, agents and bankers. The company's platform brings together real estate developers, sales teams, bankers, lawyers and buyers, enabling clients to avoid long and arduous property sales journeys.

name: Myblynk Inc
description: Operator of a property tech marketplace platform intended to protect clients' property ownership, and transform it into a digital wallet. The company's platform offers a digital home registration service, home equity investment, financing at low-interest rates and a custom dashboard for the organization, enabling borrowers with online and effortless access to mortgage options.

name: Mubitoperaciones S.A.P.I de C.V.
description: Provider of a storage service intended to store valuables and goods securely. The company allows users to store furniture, files, boxes, and anything they want in macro-warehouses with a single click, enabling individuals to ensure the benefit from hassle-less, economic, and intelligent storage.

name: Pellego, Inc.
description: Flat fee firm focused on the 2.5m real estate agents who use their license part time. Beachhead market of real estate investors with an agent license. Growing at 100% per year (3 years in a row) with 13x LTV:CAC and $1m ARR.

name: Portal Terreno, Inc.
description: Developer of real estate marketplace designed to generate information regarding real estate. The company's platform accelerates the sale of land for different projects, enabling customers to tap into an unexplored market and find good opportunities to buy real estate and land.

name: Renotag Corp.
description: Renotag is a renovation cost calculator gives you accurate market pricing for your project — like having a contractor in your pocket.

name: Smart Bricks Holdings Limited
description: The Smarter Way to Invest in Residential Real Estate - Powered by AI.
